Seperti Andre Gomes, Para Pemain ini Juga Pernah Alami Cedera Horor
04 Nov 2019, 23:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Cedera horor yang dialami oleh gelandang Everton Andre Gomes juga pernah terjadi pada sejumlah pemain lain, termasuk penyerang asal Indonesia, Boaz Salossa.
Pemain asal Portugal tersebut mengalami cedera parah pada engkelnya. Ia mengalami cedera itu saat bermain melawan Tottenham di matchay 11 Premier League di Goodison Park.
Pada menit ke-78, ia terjatuh setelah Son Heung-Min berusaha merebut bola dari kakinya. Sayangnya ia terjatuh dan bertabrakan dengan Serge Aurier.
Setelah tabrakan itu, Gomes memengangi kaki kanannya. Ia berteriak dengan kencang dan menangis.
Son terlihat sangat hancur melihat efek tekel yang dilakukannya terhadap Gomes. Pemain asal Korea Selatan ini bahkan terlihat harus ditenangkan oleh beberapa pemain, termasuk dari pemain Everton.
Gomes sendiri kemudian dibawa ke ambulans dan dilarikan ke rumah sakit. Sang pemain dikabarkan langsung menjalani operasi.
Selain Andre Gomes, berikut ini lima pemain yang pernah mengalami cedera horor.
text:
Like Andre Gomes, these players have also experienced horror injuries
Nov 04 2019, 23:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The horror injury suffered by Everton midfielder Andre Gomes has also happened to a number of other players, including Indonesian striker Boaz Salossa.
The Portuguese player suffered a serious injury to the ankle. He suffered the injury while playing against Tottenham in Matchay 11 Premier League at Goodison Park.
In the 78th minute, he fell after Son Heung-Min tried to grab the ball from his feet. Unfortunately he fell and collided with Serge Aurier.
After the collision, Gomes held his right leg. He shouted loudly and cried.
Son looked devastated to see the effect of his tackling on Gomes. The South Korean player even seems to have to be calmed down by several players, including from Everton players.
Gomes himself was then taken to an ambulance and rushed to the hospital. The player reportedly underwent surgery immediately.
Besides Andre Gomes, here are five players who have suffered horror injuries.
